tool_description: An API showing all the champions in League of Legends and their base stats.

api_list.name: Get A Specific Champion's Base Stats
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the base stats of a specific champion in League of Legends.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The name of the champion for which to retrieve base stats.

api_list.name: Get All Champion Base Stats
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all base stats from every champion in the game.

api_list.name: Get List of All Champion Names
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of all champion names available in League of Legends.
